Wisdom: شَرُّ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ دَاهَنَكَ فِي نَفْسِكَ وَسَاتَرَكَ عَيْبَكَ
enWisdom: The worst of your brothers is the one who flatters you and hides your faults from you
Whoever hides your fault from you and exposes your fault in your absence, then he is your [real] enemy, so be careful of him

Wisdom: مَنْ دَاهَنَكَ فِي عَيْبِكَ عَابَكَ فِي غَيْبِكَ
enWisdom: One who flatters you for your fault, criticizes you in your absence

Wisdom: مَنْ سَاتَرَكَ عَيْبَكَ وَعَابَكَ فِي غَيْبِكَ فَهُوَ الْعَدُوُّ فَاحْذَرْهُ
enWisdom: Whoever hides your fault from you and exposes your fault in your absence, then he is your [real] enemy, so be careful of him

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَنْصَحْكَ فِي صَدَاقَتِهِ فَلَا تَعْذِرْهُ
enWisdom: One whose friendship does not benefit you, his enmity will harm you
